channel.title: Coaching on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Coaching on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: How I Rationalize Being So Hard on Myself, & How I’m Going to Stop
item.description: I’m my own worst critic. A lot of us are. I don’t like this about myself. A lot of us don’t. But I finally have a strategy to make it stop happening. Of course we’re our own worst critics: we know better than anyone else our abilities, capacities, our “should”s — we know our potential, so we know when we fall short.
